cont.entity_a: Good range, even with channel bonding turned off. Router provides great range but requires regular firmware upgrades. Router's wireless range is several times further than previous models.
cont.entity_b: Router offers good range with security enabled. Router provides good range and speed. Router provides good performance at 20' distance.

cont.entity_a: Serious incompatibility problems with PlayStation 3 and Cingular 8525. Intermittent problems with Toshiba Tecra M5 and Dell m700. Router works well with XP laptops and Xbox but has issues with HP 9000 series Vista.
cont.entity_b: Router has issues with PS3 compatibility.

cont.entity_a: Router provides excellent connection throughout the house. Easy to install and provides strong signal through obstacles. Router setup was easy but drops connection with multiple wireless connections. Router stays connected for months without dropping packets. Router provides excellent speed and range when working properly.
cont.entity_b: Router provides good performance with updated PCMCIA card. Router provides strong WiFi signal and good speed. Router provides strong WiFi signal with full bars.

cont.entity_a: Router setup was easy but drops connection with multiple wireless connections. Setting up the router was difficult and required customer service assistance.
cont.entity_b: Router requires tech support for setup. Router setup was straightforward with helpful customer service. Router setup was difficult without updated software. Router setup was easy and provides good signal range.

cont.entity_a: Router does not support third-party firmware. Router requires firmware update for stable operation. Router frequently drops connection despite firmware updates. Router requires frequent resets due to dropping wireless packets.
cont.entity_b: Router works well with third-party firmware like Tomato. Router's firmware can be replaced with DD-WRT for enhanced functionality. Router requires frequent resets to maintain connection.

cont.entity_a: Customer service is unresponsive. Linksys tech support was helpful in resolving setup problems.
cont.entity_b: Router setup was straightforward with helpful customer service. Router setup was difficult and required Verizon help desk.

cont.entity_a: Fast throughput and many configuration options. Improved signal and performance with SRX400 card. Router provides excellent speed and range when working properly. Router provides strong signal and fast speed.
cont.entity_b: Router provides good performance with updated PCMCIA card. Router provides good performance with Tomato firmware. Router offers good data rates with SpeedBooster card.

cont.entity_a: Router is sensitive to power surges.
cont.entity_b: Router's power adapter makes a loud buzzing noise. Router's power adapter is loud and annoying.

cont.entity_a: Router stopped working after a month. Product did not last long before needing replacement. Defective unit returned for refund.

cont.entity_b: Router offers good range with security enabled.

cont.entity_a: Subnet address cannot be changed, restricting VPN remote access. Do not access the router via a browser with active sessions to avoid VPN session drops.
cont.entity_b: Router's installation CD is not Mac compatible. Router is not Mac friendly.

cont.entity_a: Router drops connections twice a week despite firmware upgrades. Router drops wireless connection every 30 minutes. Router requires frequent resets to maintain wireless connectivity.
cont.entity_b: Router has issues with maintaining network settings. Router has issues with maintaining wireless settings.
